you might want to look in the logrotate config, it defines ownership and permission of the new logfiles after it rotates the old ones
is the directory 'logs' in the current directory, or actually /logs off the root directory?
sudo chown -R user:group directory  -- no leading / if it's relative to the directory you're in now.
try changing just the owner: sudo chown -R unreal logs
